General.Name: A.F.P. Provida
General.Description: Administradora de Fondos de Pensiones Provida S.A. is a corporation formed under the laws of Chile. Its deed of incorporation was executed on March 3, 1981 and was registered in the Registry of Commerce in Santiago of Chile on April 6, 1981, under number 6,060, subsection 3,268. Provida's by-laws specify that the Company shall have a duration of one hundred years, beginning on the date on which its existence was authorized. Provida's registered office is located at 100 Pedro de Valdivia Avenue, 16th floor, Providencia, Santiago, Chile. Provida's telephone number at that location is (56-2) 2351-1200 and its website is www.provida.cl.
